title: Which is the best place to take kids in Dhaka? - Quora
tags: Visiting and Travel in Dhaka, Bangladesh

response.answer_text: You can find most popular and common places for your kids from this category wise list. And many more exist if you browse in internet. 1. Nature and Park: a. Ramna Park b. Gulshan Lake Park c. Baldha Garden, wari d. Botanical Garden, Mirpur e. Dhaka Zoo 2. Museum a. Bangladesh National Museum b. Liberation War Museum c. Bangabandhu Memorial Museum 3. Ancient Place a. Lalbag Fort b. Ahsan Manzil c. Sonargaon d. Curzon Hall 4. Amusement Park a. Jamuna Future Park b. Dhaka Shishu Park c. Fantasy Kingdom

I made a list of places to visit with the help of my nephews and nieces. They are all under the age of 15 years, so they can be referred to as kids. Here goes the list: Lalbagh Fort -Lalbagh, Old DhakaAhsan Manzil - Near Shadarghat Launch TerminalBangladesh National Museum - ShahbagBangladesh National Zoo - MirpurJatiya Sangsad Bhaban (Parliament Building) - KhamarbariShishu Park - ShahbagDhanmondi Lake Boat Ride - DhanmondiBangabandhu Sheikh Mujibur Rahman Novo Theatre - Bijoy SharaniRamna Park - RamnaMuseum of Independence - It's inside Shahrawardi Uddyan in ShahbagBangladesh Air Force Museum - Bijoy SharaniBangladesh Military Museum - Bijoy SharaniThese places are inside Dhaka city. However, there are many good places that are in the outskirts of Dhaka. I hope this helps.
